bibl.idno: The Philip S. Hench Walter Reed/Yellow Fever Collection [manuscript] / [collected by] Philip S. Hench ; HEALTHSCI MS-1.

div1.p: These selections from Rojas' notebook concern the rent for Camp Lazear.

div1.head: Notebook of Ignacio Rojas, 1901
div1.p:
Hoy se le devolvieron firme
dos los Vouchers al Major
J. R Kean Surgeon U S. A Dis-
bursing Officer que compren
den los dos meses de arren
damiento del terreno occupado
por el Camp Lazear. Experimen
tal Sanitariy Camp en la fina
In José y que rencies. [unclear] n Agos-
to 10 y Septebre 9.

A razon de $ 20. oro Americano
al mes- Jan $ 40.00 -oro-

ms
Reed kept on renting Camp Lazear
several months after the work finished
in case he wanted to return for
more work

DR. PHILIP S. HENCH
MAYO CLINIC
ROCHESTER, MINN,

El Major J. R. Kean Surgeon
U. S. Army Disbursing Officer
remitio hoy los Voucher para
firmar para el pago de la
renta del Campo de Lezar
comprendida del 9 de Marzo
al 10 de Mayo. en la fina
In José Marianao-

ms
note how Dr Rojas wrote in his
day book
2 mos rent 9 March - 10 May 1901

DR. PHILIP S. HENCH
MAYO CLINIC
ROCHESTER, MINN,

Kean kept the purse for Reed &
paid the money I have
the check - book
